replies.body: Way to dig up an old thread you twat.

hahaha, it's people like you who don't help in game that cause people to get angry, then you want to have a cry over that. Just that. LOL. This is why Riot and this game, including humanity as a whole, is all getting wiped out. Funny that used to be how you met friends through trash talking. Now you all need your safe spaces. LOL. 
Trump should deport you.
Yet another case of riot protecting the offender rather than the victim.
Make a ticket, all though they still don't punish the player even then.

Send a support ticket, receive the same standard response and check back in a few days/weeks and see the guy is still playing unpunished.

Really just report and move on. Anything else is a total waste of time.

I've wasted my time on several occasions submitting tickets with screen caps of ingame abuse and the same player was still chatting/playing away AFTER I received the standard response from Riot.

Hardly seems fair when you can be auto banned or chat restricted for simple negative attitude (not verbal abuse).
No namerino shamerino. Send in a support ticket.
